author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Anti Human Trafficking Unit (AHTU) of Tiruchi Rural Police rescued a 12-year-old runaway boy who was found wandering at Thuvakudi bus stand on the city’s outskirts on Thursday.

A resident of Sozhampettai in Mayiladuthurai taluk in Nagapattinam district, the boy left his home after a tiff with his parents. A police press release said the boy boarded a train and arrived in Tiruverambur.

He was wandering in the Thuvakudi bus stand when the AHTU team rescued the minor and informed his parents. The boy was later produced before the Child Welfare Committee.
title: Police rescue runaway boy
